name: Driving Evolution Parking Sim Real Car Driver Test
name_original: Driving Evolution Parking Sim Real Car Driver Test
description:
Get your driving gloves on! Download and play Driving Evolution - the ultimate experience for every motorsport enthusiast! Now with 5 new cars!

FEATURES
▶ 20 OF THE MOST ICONIC AND GROUND-BREAKING CARS: Experience every era of motoring since the invention of the very first motorcar!
▶ 75 FAST & FRANTIC MISSIONS: Enter various exciting events including drifting, hillclimbing, race time trials, slaloms, and obstacle courses!
▶ CUSTOMISABLE CONTROL METHODS: Play the way you want it, using the tilt, buttons, or the steering wheel!
▶ MULTIPLE VIEWS: Immerse yourself in the race with a variety of views (including bonnet cam)!

Drift, race and park 20 of the greatest cars the world has ever seen. Discover how cars have evolved in design and performance throughout the years!

Five of those cars are brand new and introduced in the latest update! You can unlock them completing special challenges in the free roam mode. Can you get all of those premium cars? Find out for yourself!

From the vintage pioneers of yesteryear, classic sports cars, and cabriolets of the 50s and 60s, stylish limousines and sedans from the early 1900s, right up to cutting-edge supercars and a futuristic prototype…welcome to the most eclectic collection of cars ever!

Put them to the test in our epic car driving school, and see how fast you can get every car around the various tracks and courses. Don’t forget how expensive these cars are…but don’t worry, in case of a crash: we’ve got insurance!

Explore the beautiful stately home grounds with their dedicated racetrack and hill climb course. Enjoy the majesty of these special cars being driven the way they’re meant to be! Show off your precision driving and parking skills, and give the crowds a thrill!
